channel.title: Can someone help with a few things?
channel.description:
Where can i make it so everything is safe and non attackable. Then i wanna make it so the ghorrock place is the only pk area.
Also, how do i make it so you need the mage lvl for the spell?
And if someone knows how to make it so emote icons takes you to places.

item.title: Can someone help with a few things?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

go to client.java

search for this

else if(playerLevel[6] <= 94)

and you can change the 94 to anything you want

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone help with a few things?

item.title: Can someone help with a few things?
item.dc:creator: @Coder_X Coder X
item.description:
@Coder_X wrote:

Explain it please…and that magic lvl thing just made an error on my server i can’t fix :mad:

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone help with a few things?

item.title: Can someone help with a few things?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Guru Java Guru
item.description:
@Java_Guru wrote:

  1. Reverse the nonWild() method and change the coords inside it to a square around the place you want to be wild.

  2. if(playerLevel[6] >= levelRequired) {
    //mage stuff
    } else {
    sendMessage(“You need a higher mage level to cast this spell!”);
    }

  3. Edit the case for that particular emote button.

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone help with a few things?
